from sys import stdin
input = stdin.readline
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    print(n - 1 if n * (n + 1) // 2 & 1 else n)

for _ in range(int(input())):
    n = int(input())
    l = [x for x in range(1, n + 1, 2)]
    print(n - 1 if len(l) % 2 != 0 else n)

T = int(input())
for _ in range(T):
    N = int(input())
    summ = N * (N + 1) / 2
    print(N) if summ % 2 == 0 else print(N - 1)
